alert.note: Alert for Benton; Polk (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 3:43PM PST until December 22 at 2:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oregon... Luckiamute River near Suver affecting Polk and Benton Counties. For the Willamette River Tributaries...including Suver...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Luckiamute River near Suver. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Above 27.0 feet, expect flooding of low lying and agricultural lands in the vicinity of Sarah Helmick State Park, Highway 99W, and Parker Road. Some secondary roads and rural access roads may be flooded at this point. Flooding along Buena Vista Rd near the confluence with the Willamette is also likely, especially if the Willamette is running high. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:11 PM PST Monday the stage was 25.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 27.3 feet late tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 345 AM PST.
